sentences.en: A good joke or a mystery novel has along wind up to the final punchline.
sentences.cn: 好的笑话,或神秘小说,都是一路曲折,直至最后的笑料或真相.

sentences.en: Even then, the magical pause can strengthen the punchline.
sentences.cn: 即使这样, 有魔力的停顿依然可以增强笑点.

sentences.en: The pause adds punch to the punchline!
sentences.cn: 停顿为笑点增强冲击效果!

trans.tran_cn: 故事、笑话等中的妙语；关键语
trans.tran_en: the last few words of a joke or story, that make it funny or surprising

trans.tran_cn: （指一整段笑话中最后几句最能引人发笑的）点睛之笔，妙语如珠
trans.tran_en: the last few words of a joke or story, that make it funny or surprising
